Package ca.phon.phonex

Interface PhoneMatcher

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AnyDiacriticPhoneMatcher, BasePhoneMatcher, CombiningDiacriticPhoneMatcher, CompoundPhoneMatcher, DiacriticPhoneMatcher, DiphthongMatcher, FeatureSetMatcher, IntraWordPauseMatcher, PhoneClassMatcher, PrefixDiacriticPhoneMatcher, RegexMatcher, SonorityDistancePhoneMatcher, StressMatcher, SuffixDiacriticPhoneMatcher, SyllableConstituentMatcher, ToneMatcher
    public interface PhoneMatcher
    Interface for providing 'matching' capabilites for IPAElement objects.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean matches​(IPAElement p)
      Perform test on given phone.
      boolean matchesAnything()
      Does this matcher match anything? Used at runtime to help determine proper backtracking paths.

        Does this matcher match anything? Used at runtime to help determine proper backtracking paths.
